description: Prayer Times for android wear is an app that will show you the muslim daily pray schedule based on user location on your watch. Main Features:- Accurate Prayer time calculated based on your current location - Several methods of calculation (for Fajr and Isha).- Various juristic methods (for Asr).- Display the hours with the AM/PM format Or 24 format.- Display the Hijri Calender with name of the day.- Remaining time for the next prayer is mentioned to help you prepare for the prayer in time.- Notifications for prayer times on your watch.- Support Arabic and English language.- More than 10 different colors to customize the screen.More Features are coming soon... This app it`s working only on android wear device This Version is BETAversion , so please before writing any bad comments contact with me via my email: Alhazmy15@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Prayer Times for android wear is an app that will show you the muslim daily pray schedule based on user location on your watch.

Main Features:
- Accurate Prayer time calculated based on your current location
- Several methods of calculation (for Fajr and Isha).
- Various juristic methods (for Asr).
- Display the hours with the AM/PM format Or 24 format.
- Display the Hijri Calender with name of the day.
- Remaining time for the next prayer is mentioned to help you prepare for the prayer in time.
- Notifications for prayer times on your watch.
- Support Arabic and English language.
- More than 10 different colors to customize the screen.

More Features are coming soon...
This app it`s working only on android wear device


This Version is BETAversion , so please before writing any bad comments contact with me via my email:
Alhazmy15@gmail.com
comments: Would be amazing to work with watch faces on Android wear 2.0. To have the next prayer time on my pre-installed watch faces for my LG watch sport. Hope the dev updates it soon Inshallah
LG G square watch Great app. But when displaying the time, it cuts the Magrib and Isha time in Arabic. It doesn't render to fit the entire display of the LG G square watch. Please fix. Thanks.
Need fix JAK for such app. I am using it on LG Watch and found the last two prayers are not fully displayed.  They are cut off. That's all for now.
It's good, but it could be better... Please can you resize or give option to resize as on Sony Smartwatch 3 it doesn't show Maghrib or Esha Prayer times.
Great app Need resizing... Magrib and Isha not display properly on resolution 320x320
Works well on my Moto 360. Very usefull app for Android Wear watches. Barakallahu fiikum
